00025 // Modified the code to a template which can be used with char and wchar.
00026 
00027 #if !defined(Apoxi_WildcardStrncmp_hpp)
00028 #define Apoxi_WildcardStrncmp_hpp
00029 
00030 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00031 
00097 template <typename T>
00098 INT wc_strncmp(const T * pattern,      /* match this str (can contain *,?) */
00099                const T * candidate,    /*   against this one. */
00100                INT count,              /* require count chars in pattern */
00101                INT do_case,            /* 0 = no case, !0 = cased compare */ 
00102                INT do_wildcards);      /* 0 = no wc's, !0 = honor * and ? */
00103 
00104 #define WC_QUES '?'
00105 #define WC_STAR '*'
00106 
00107 /* string and character match/no-match return codes */
00108 
00109 enum {
00110   WC_MATCH = 0,     /* char/string-match succeed */
00111   WC_MISMATCH,      /* general char/string-match fail */
00112   WC_PAT_NULL_PTR,  /* (char *) pattern == NULL */
00113   WC_CAN_NULL_PTR,  /* (char *) candidate == NULL */
00114   WC_PAT_TOO_SHORT, /* too few pattern chars to satisfy count */
00115   WC_CAN_TOO_SHORT  /* too few candidate chars to satisfy '?' in pattern */
00116 };
00117 
00118 #endif  // Apoxi_WildcardStrncmp_hpp
